articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia 
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in booklet by the Russian Khabarovsk Publishing House Yedeniye.
 The work made public on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is an immortal great programme of party building and activity which proudly reviewed the glorious history of the WPK which had blazed a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicated the way of strengthening the WPK as the eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.content:
Efficacious Preventives for Cancer Developed 
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- An institute under the Academy of Medical Science of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has developed "SDS" (solution of dodecyl sodium sulfate) and Plakitin, which prevent abdominal cancer from its return and spread.
 The "SDS" kills cancer cells and Plakitin has a slow effect on preventing the cancer from returning and spreading.    
 Plakitin has no side effect such as digestive troubles but sustainied anti-cancer effect.

articles.title: Credentials from Representative of UNICEF
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets Pakistani Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and had a talk with Pakistani Ambassador to the DPRK Sultan Habib, who paid a farewell call on him today.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Credentials from Representative of UNICEF
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun received credentials from Pierrette Vu Thi, representative of UNICEF in the DPRK, on Oct. 6.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and 58th anniversary of the WPK.
 They were conveyed to Jong Ha Chol, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, by Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, who is doyen of the corps, today.

articles.title: Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Indoor Stadium Opens
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was sent to leader Kim Jong Il by Yasser Arafat, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 58th anniversary of the WPK.
 The floral basket was handed to Jong Ha Chol, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, today by Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian ambassador e.p. to the DPRK.
